name: 5 Petal Wired Flower Corsage/Brooch/Pin/Hair Barrette
description:
Each flower is approximately 14cm in diameter and individually crafted from recycled/reclaimed fabrics.  With a bead/button centre, wired petals for bending into shape and a brooch and hair barette for fastening on the reverse, it makes a lovely addition to that special outfit.  Comes with artists card, wrapped in a cello bag ready for giftwrapping.

Pictured in:
Fiery Orange
Purple/Gold
Olive Green/Gold
Scarlet
Baby Pink/Lilac
Gold

Also available in a colour scheme of your choice including Ivory or White.  Feel free to contact me to discuss having a special order made.

Please note all items are individually crafted and therefore may differ slightly from image shown, however the basic color scheme and shape will be as pictured.

name: Flapper Style 3 Petal Fascinator Comb
description:
Flapper inspired feathered fascinator comb for all occasions.

Measuring approximately 12x20cm (including feathers) and attached to a flexible high quality hair comb, this three feathered delight would be a lovely addition to that special outfit.

Each comb is individually crafted from recycled,reclaimed fabrics with a bead/button centre, wired petals for bending into shape and has a feather cluster as well as each petal being individually wired allowing easy manipulation to conform to any head shape.

Pictured in:
Scarlet
Black/Silver
Baby Pink/Lilac
Peacock (shown with 5 petals for display only)
Purple/Gold
Fiery Orange

Also available in a colour scheme of your choice including Ivory or White. Feel free to contact me to discuss having a special order made.

Comes with artists card wrapped in cello bag ready for giftwrapping.

Please note all items are individually crafted and therefore may differ slightly from image shown, however the basic color scheme and shape will be as pictured.

name: Enchantment Under The Sea Mini Art Quilt
description:
Embellished with delicate glass beads and natural shells, this one of a kind wool and silk needle felted mini art quilt is based on the magical colours found in the ocean.

The piece is lightly padded and backed with 100% silk dupion and my designer label attached.  It is packaged in acid free tissue paper
and includes an artist card, making it perfect to give as a gift.

Measures approximately 14.5cm x 25.5cm.

name: Art Deco Style 3 Petal Hair Comb
description:
This gorgeous hair comb is truely unique. Handmade from fabric scraps, beads and metallic thread, no two pieces are the same. Lengths of wire sewn into each of the petals allows the wearer to fully manipulate its shape. Each petal is backed with 100% brown silk dupion.

The flower measures approximately 11cm high x 14cm wide including the high quality flexible plastic comb.

Would make a lovely addition to that special outfit or as a cute gift. Comes with artists card wrapped in cello bag ready for giftwrapping.

Also available in a colour scheme of your choice including Ivory or white, The listing is for ONE flower *please mention in the buyers notes which colour you would like I will list it as reserved for you to purchase. Any questions please contact me.
